name: Spinach Stracciatella
recipeCategory: lunch, one pot, soups and stews
keywords: chicken stock, eggs, spinach, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 cups finely shredded fresh spinach leaves
3 tablespoons freshly grated imported Italian Parmesan cheese

recipeInstructions.text: In a two-quart saucepan, saute the spinach in the olive oil for a minute or two, just until it begins to wilt. Add the chicken stock and simmer for five minutes.

Bring soup to a simmer and stir with a fork while allowing the egg mixture to dribble into the soup very slowly. Lower heat, taste for seasoning and serve at once, with some of the Parmesan cheese dusted onto each serving.
